attributes.additional_details: I petition the government to hold a higher standard than this and remove this man from office immediately. I petition the government to implement AND enforce a HIGHER standard of values, ethics and behaviour and expect this not only from elected representatives, but from their team of unelected advisers, staff and civil servants. I petition the government to demonstrate the view that in the UNITED KINGDOM under Her Majesty Queen Elisabeth the II, LIFE is considered more valuable than MONEY.
attributes.background: Sunday Times publication from 22nd March 2020, quote sources (multiple) referencing Dominic Cummings summation of governments policy in the face of the coronoa virus epidemic. The policy summation indicated citizens dying was secondary to the plight of the economy.

rejection.details:
We can't publish petitions about honours and appointments, which includes calling for a Special Adviser to resign or lose their job.

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/

UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/coronavirus
